bibl.title: Revolutions in Time: Studies in Ancient Egyptian Calendrics
bibl.note: Constitue le 4e et dernier chapitre du recueil. - 4.1. Introduction. - 4.2. Lunar Calendar Epochs: Egypt vs. Greece and Babylonia. - 4.3. The Macedonian Calendar. - 4.4. The 25-Year Cycle of P. Carlsberg 9. - 4.5. Recent Macedonian Calendar Problems [critique de: Erhard GRZYBEK, Du calendrier macédonien au calendrier ptolémaïque. Problèmes de chronologie hellénistique (Basel, 1990)]. - 4.6. Conclusions. Notes and References.
SPALINGER Anthony J., Under the Moon of Earth.
Anthony J. SPALINGER (Ed.), Revolutions in Time: Studies in Ancient Egyptian Calendrics = Varia Aegyptiaca. Supplement. 6 (San Antonio, Texas, 1994) pp. 61-83, 9 graphiques.
